column4: Does anyone know what mouse button scroll wheel up and down is? I'm trying to get compiz to work on xubuntu.
its handy, specially to see if media keys are dead or not :)
if you log in to XFCE then press ALT+F2 and run:  compzi --replace    what happens?
do you use an nvidia video chip..
if you hold ALT you can drag a window from anywhere on the application window
do you use an nvidia GPU?
again, you can hold ALT and drag from any part of the window
do you have the move plugin enabled in ccsm?
you may need an xorg.conf and add the options: http://pastie.org/4043587
so run:  sudo nvidia-xconfig; gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf    add that under the: Driver "nvidia" line
looks fnie, the file is made
you have the xorg.conf file, just add the 2 lines and you are done...
oh yeah its xfce:  gksudo mousepad /etc/X11/xorg.conf
